skills.name: Bubbling Offering
skills.desc: Deals 1 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG. The target character receives <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Mist Bubble.

skills.name: Rite of Mortal Water
skills.desc: Deals 4 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG. The target character receives <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Mist Bubble.

skills.name: Hydro Shield
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Hydro Shield.

skills.name: Aegis of the Abyss
skills.desc: (Passive) When the shield is broken, after this character uses a Skill: Restore the <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Hydro Shield.
